name: ROBO DOOM
description:
RoboDoom is a game made during the 2020 GMTK game jam.

The player will control a robot in an hostile land, but something happened and you can't control either movement and the attacks of the robot. The only thing you can do is to switch the weapons it has on board in order to get it back to safety.

Please, Let me know if you actually finish it :)

Disclaimer:

- It might be frustrating, but easy enough when you get back in control.

- You could speed run it in 5 minutes

- If you are having troubles, try to think of it not like a shooter

(credits in the main menu)
